markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Among the Xulgaths](/Articles.aspx?ID=12)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 62</row>

Mighty subterranean people known as troglodytes on the surface, [xulgaths](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=102) are inheritors of a long, bloody history and the fearsome powers of a demon lord.
name: Among the Xulgaths
